{"id":1734155435,"question_id":3944,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1755111096,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"155 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1734155435/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Time to Activate String","memory":"282.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    template<class T>\n    T firstTrue(T l, T r, function<bool(T)> f) {\n        r++;\n        while (l < r) {\n            T mid = l + (r - l) / 2;\n            if (f(mid)) r = mid;\n            else l = mid + 1;\n        }\n        return l;\n    }\n\n    int minTime(string s, vector<int>& order, int k) {\n        // binary search\n        \n        // check steps: \n        /*\n        loop through and replace string w/ order (N time)\n        use dp to count number of valid substrings\n\n        dp[i] is the max number of valid substrings using the first i digits\n        if s[i] == '*', then we add i to the count. dp[i] = dp[i-1] + (i + 1)\n        if s[i] != '*', then we add prev, where prev was the index of the last '*'. dp[i] = dp[i-1] + (prev + 1)\n        */\n\n        // t is from 0 to n-1\n        int MXK = 1e9+1;\n\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        const auto ok = [&](int t) {\n            string st = s;\n            for (int i=0; i<=t; i++) \n                st[order[i]] = '*';\n\n            vector<int> dp(N, 0);\n            int prev = -1;\n            for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n                if (st[i] == '*') prev = i;\n                if (prev != -1) {\n                    dp[i] = prev + 1;\n                    if (i) dp[i] += dp[i-1];\n                    dp[i] = min(dp[i], MXK);\n                }\n            }\n            return dp[N-1] >= k;\n        };\n\n        int ans = firstTrue<int>(0, N-1, ok);\n        return ans == N ? -1 : ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-time-to-activate-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1175}
